gen:link.msg:message: `JointVentureTailoredEducation` MUST NOT be reported, because the reported value of `Sector` is equal to `hbo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_EntityInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_EntityInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_EntityInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_JointVentureTailoredEducation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_EntityInformationEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_JointVentureTailoredEducation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
